# Roman Izmestev — Full-Stack Developer

> Roman Izmestev is a full-stack developer based in Vladivostok, Russia, specializing in web development, eCommerce, and mobile applications. He builds digital products for clients worldwide using React, Next.js, Flutter, Shopify, and WordPress.

## About

Roman Izmestev has 5+ years of experience building digital products. He has launched 15+ projects for clients across Russia, UAE, South Korea, and the USA. He works as a freelance developer and leverages AI-driven development tools to ship faster and maintain high code quality.

- Location: Vladivostok, Russia (UTC+10)
- Languages: English, Russian
- Contact: romikizm@gmail.com
- Telegram: https://t.me/romaizm
- GitHub: https://github.com/romaizm

## Services

- Web Development: Custom websites using Next.js, React, WordPress, Webflow, and Bitrix
- eCommerce Development: Online stores on Shopify (Liquid) and WooCommerce
- Mobile Development: Cross-platform apps with Flutter for iOS and Android
- Web Applications: Custom dashboards, admin panels, and internal business tools
- Digital Services: SEO optimization, brand development, email marketing automation

Hourly rate starts from $50/hour.

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Mobile: Flutter, Dart
- eCommerce: Shopify, Liquid, WordPress, WooCommerce
- Backend: Node.js, REST API, PostgreSQL, Firebase
- AI Tools: Claude, Cursor.ai, ChatGPT
- DevOps: Git, Vercel, Linux

## Selected Projects

- Oloaa Granola (UAE) — Shopify eCommerce store, grew sales from 0 to 5,000+ AED/month
- Yuwab Coaching (South Korea) — Flutter mobile app + SaaS platform built from scratch
- FreyCouture (UAE) — Shopify fashion eCommerce store
- CGPC (South Korea) — WordPress business website
- Hikor (Russia) — WooCommerce eCommerce store
- JPLab Shop (Russia) — Shopify cosmetics eCommerce store
- AutoZakaz (Russia) — Custom auction platform + business website

## Education

- Bachelor in International Economics — Far Eastern Federal University (2014-2018)
- Bachelor in Finance — University of Maryland Global Campus (2014-2018)

## Work History

- Full-Stack Developer, Freelance (2020 — Present)
- Main Technical Engineer, Yuwab Consulting (Nov 2024 — Oct 2025)
- eCommerce Store Manager, Oloaa Granola (Jan 2024 — Jul 2025)
- Customer Support 2nd Line, Ecwid by Lightspeed (Jan 2020 — Feb 2025)
- Marketing Manager, Korean Air (Feb 2019 — Aug 2019)
